attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The historic county of LINCOLNSHIRE is no longer funded equally by this labour government, education, social services, the police and the transport system are all at the bottom of the funding pile ! We no longer need this government, LINCOLNSHIRE could fund itself ! From the Humber to the Wash we have 3 great ports (Immingham, Grimsby and Boston) we have our own oil reserves which benifit us not 1 iota and in this county of rich arable land we grow 20% of the whole nations food.In short the country needs LINCOLNSHIRE more than we need it. Keep your multicultural con to yourself mr brown, give us the freedom to rule ourselves. Kosovo was granted this, give us the same, you gave them a homeland, let us have ours.
